import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Candidate() { const[candidate , setCandidate] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:8081/') .then(res => setCandidate(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) },[]) return (

Candidates Registered

{ candidate.map((data,i) => ( )) }
Id Name Area of Expertise Education Experience
{data.candidate_id} {data.name} {data.area_of_expertise} {data.education} {data.experience}
) } export default Candidate
